author: mbed Taiwan
title: ARM mbed for Young
about: Young Innovator Camp (YIC) is a branch of Mokoversity farm plan. YIC is designed for ages 14-19. In YIC, they will attend CS101 courses during the 5-days camp, and enjoy problem solving challenge.

index.chapter: 第 1 章：學習 First Order Logic
index.desc: 認識 First Order Logic、開始寫第一個程式
